text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki bhala dekho to ki agar ye (quraan) khuda kee taraph se ho aur tum usase inkaar kar baithe haaloki (banee isaraeel mein se) ek gavaah usake misal kee gavaahee bhee de chuka aur eemaan bhee le aaya aur tumane sarakashee kee (to tumhaare zaalim hone mein kya shaq hai) beshak khuda zaalim logon ko manzil maqasood tak nahin pahunchaata
